item.title: The VENCAst — February 22, 2026
item.description: The world's businesses are bracing for impact after a US Supreme Court decision sparked an immediate jump in global import tariffs from ten to fifteen percent.

item.title: The VENCAst — February 21, 2026
item.description: The US Supreme Court struck down a president's sweeping tariffs as illegal, but President Trump had a new plan ready to go, literally minutes later, signing an executive order for new global levies under different legal grounds. Talk about a swift co...

item.title: The VENCAst — February 20, 2026
item.description: The US Supreme Court just dropped a bombshell, potentially forcing the government to refund over 175 billion dollars in duties, a move that could reshape global trade.
